definition: quota/number of places/place (in an institution, a group etc)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: Limited seats offered in first-served basis. Please fill in the form and return as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 名額有限先到先得方法取錄，請儘快填妥寄回。

sentences.english: Seek advice at the same time appoint commissarial number will be flexibility, without limitation of rigid quota of people.
sentences.chinese: 同時諮詢委委員人數將是彈性的，無硬性名額限制。

sentences.english: I find it very strange, why should the quota of teachers to me?
sentences.chinese: 但我覺得很奇怪，爲什麼相老師要把這個名額給我呢？

sentences.english: Limited quota of chocolate box set will be available on a first-come first-served basis.
sentences.chinese: 朱古力禮盒名額有限，先到先得，換完即止。

sentences.english: First explain why Patels, the head of a village needs reservations?
sentences.chinese: 首先解釋爲什麼作爲村長的帕特爾人要保留名額？

sentences.english: All the minority nationalities are entitled to appropriate representation.
sentences.chinese: 各少數民族都應當有適當名額的代表。

sentences.english: There was also an addition of 969 aided day nursery places for children.
sentences.chinese: 此外，政府又增加了969個日間幼兒園資助名額。

sentences.english: Space is limited, please submit this form ASAP.
sentences.chinese: 因名額有限，請儘速將本表寄回，以免向隅。

sentences.english: 33 of the 72 slots were already filled when she reached in.
sentences.chinese: 輪到她時，72個入學名額已有33個被抽走了。

sentences.english: I've budgeted for two new members of staff.
sentences.chinese: 我已經把兩名新職員名額編入預算。

sentences.english: Twelve teams are competing for the three spots.
sentences.chinese: 十二支球隊正在爲最後三個名額競爭。

sentences.english: The law doubles the number of audits required each year.
sentences.chinese: 這項法律將使今年所需的審計員名額翻倍。

sentences.english: THW allocate college enrollment quota based on each insititution's graduate employment rate.
sentences.chinese: 大學的入學名額應基於畢業生的就業率來分配。

sentences.english: The number of psychiatric day hospital places was increased to 679.
sentences.chinese: 精神科日間醫院名額增至679個。

sentences.english: Registration Deadline: the quota used up or 3 week before each examination.
sentences.chinese: 無論名額是否報滿，考試前3周自動停止受理報名。

sentences.english: Spaces are limited and will be on first come first serve basis.
sentences.chinese: 活動名額有限，報名先到先得。

definition: to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
to compete/to take part in a competition
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to enter oneself for an examination
